title: Hidden - China's Flagship EVs are Exploding in Huge Numbers
description:
Protect yourself online with Guardio - https://guard.io/serpentza

A huge wave of explosions are causing China's best cars to burn to the ground

Join me for the China Show, a weekly dive into what's happening in China: https://www.youtube.com/advpodcasts

And don't forget my secret Monday Show: 
https://patreon.com/advpodcasts

Follow @GundamNorthrop on Twitter who watches and posts regularly about Chinese EV fires and incidents.
